sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解於甲醇並加入過量氫氧化銨。

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 當食用油冷卻時，先將甲醇和氫氧化鈉。

sentences.english: Hydroxides include the familiar alkalies of laboratory and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化物包括實驗室和工業過程中常用的鹼。

sentences.english: Soluble metallic hydroxides are bases that are alkalies .
sentences.chinese: 可溶解的金屬氫氧化合物都是鹼。

sentences.english: Magnesium aluminum hydroxides show higher adsorption capacity to the model pitch and stickies at neutral pH.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧化鎂鋁對樹脂和膠黏物在中性條件下吸附量較大。

sentences.english: Hydroxyl has an extremely oxidizing nature.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧基具有極強的氧化特性。

sentences.english: Pure nickel silk with steady potential in KOH solution could be used as reference electrode.
sentences.chinese: 鎳作參比電極在氫氧化鉀溶液中的電極電勢穩定。

sentences.english: However hydroxyl has no effect on carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 但是，氫氧化物卻對二氧化碳毫無影響。

sentences.english: Some carbons are activated or washed with phosphoric acid, zinc chloride, or potassium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 一些碳被激活或磷酸，氯化鋅或氫氧化鉀，洗淨。

sentences.english: Hydrolysis was going on in sodium hydroxide solution.
sentences.chinese: 水解在氫氧化鈉溶液中進行。

sentences.english: The super-fine aluminium hydroxide is widely used due to its advantages.
sentences.chinese: 超細氫氧化鋁具有許多優點，應用廣泛。

sentences.english: The relative contents of calcium hydroxide in the colloid are inversely proportional to the colloidal particle size.
sentences.chinese: 膠體中氫氧化鈣相對含量與膠粒的大小成反比。

sentences.english: Preparation of magnesia whiskers by high-temperature flux method;
sentences.chinese: 採用循環晶種的方法制取了氫氧化鎂。

sentences.english: The hydroxyl ion has a negative charge.
sentences.chinese: 氫氧根離子有一個負電荷。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses an oxyhydrogen catalysis combustion-supporting environmental-protection fuel economizer of a motor vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 一種機動車氫氧催化助燃環保節油器。

sentences.english: An auto balance reproducing oxygen supplier using KO 2 and LiOH was provided.
sentences.chinese: 艙內用超氧化鉀和氫氧化鋰自動平衡供氧。
